name: Dorgann
abilities: When Dorgann enters the field, select 1 of the 3 following actions. If you have cast 3 or more cards this turn, select up to 2 of the following actions instead. "Choose 1 Forward of cost 5 or more. Remove it from the game." "Choose 1 Monster. Remove it from the game." "Choose 2 cards from either player's Break Zone. Remove them from the game. Draw 1 Card."
